title: In The Moment Part Four
description: Keeping two people happy in a relationship is hard enough, add in another and things get even more complicated. Adam and Ace have found their balance, but Alicia isn't sure itâ€™s what she wants at all. She doesn't want a normal relationship, let alone one that is so tough to make work. Plus, just when she thinks she has made up her mind, there is another surprise that make her decision that much more difficult.
author: Rachael Orman
